survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer attitudes and barriers towards adopting electric vehicles (EVs). It will help identify key factors influencing purchase decisions and awareness levels.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with electric vehicles (EVs)?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure familiarity. Ensure question is mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with electric vehicles (EVs)?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you have not purchased an electric vehicle?
answer_options: Range anxiety (fear of running out of charge)
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 answer is 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar'
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unique responses. Avoid leading language.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes. Add an open-text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you have not purchased an electric vehicle?
answer_options: Range anxiety (fear of running out of charge)

answer_options: Free or discounted home charger installation

questions.client_notes: Order options from most to least commonly cited incentives.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Randomize options to avoid order bias.
